column3: Yes, why not, Concept ACK\nSee here for commit squashing instructions: https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md#squashing-commits\n
That didn't work, now you have added two commits including a merge commit.\n

You can try

``` shell
git reset f4a59ab~
git commit -m "Move AdvertiseLocal debug output to net category" src/ 
```
Still needs squashing.\nIf you really don't manage to do so (try to follow @MarcoFalke's steps), you could re-do the changes as one commit.\n
